sources.title: Ghost Writers (1958)
sources.description: Two writers at Paramount Cartoon Studios try to think of good stories for Casper the Friendly Ghost. They review scenes from "Casper's Spree Under The Sea," "Once Upon A Rhyme" and "To Boo Or Not To Boo." Eventually Casper himself emerges from a poster on the wall and scares the writers away. Casper explains that he thought up that gag to end the cartoon! Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/ghost-writers-1958/

metadata.Plot: Two writers at Paramount Cartoon Studios try to think of good stories for Casper the Friendly Ghost.
metadata.Director: Seymour Kneitel, George Germanetti, Thomas Johnson
metadata.Writer: Larz Bourne, Isadore Klein, Jack Mercer
metadata.Actors: Mae Questel, Jackson Beck, Jack Mercer
